p: Other treatments in the pipeline could be further investigated against COVID-19 such as neutralizing antibodies, passive antibodies (patient sera) and ACE2 receptor-blocking agents [ 22, 23, 33, 108, 109]. Importantly, umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells have been tried as a therapeutic option against COVID-19 to prevent the cytokine storm, which is thought to be induced by an overactivated immune system in response to the virus [ 110]. Moreover, recent studies have shown that the use of famotidine, a histamine-2 receptor antagonist, is associated with a reduction in clinical deterioration of patients with COVID-19 [ 111, 112].
